title: ISic003512. I.Sicily inscription 003512
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΚΛΩΔΙΑΣΕ
2ΒΗΡΑΕΖΗΣ
3ΣΕΝΕΤΗΙΙ͡Π´
4ivy-leaf            ivy-leafivy-leaf

Apparatus criticus

Text after Bitto

English translation

Klodia Sebera, lived 7 years

commentary

The numeral is here interpreted (following Bitto) as acrophonic and ascending, i.e. two verticals, the second in ligature with a Π for πέντε. The hederae in the final line include a third hedera of different from.

bibliography

  • 5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
  • Orsi 1916 134 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701
